quests.title: Apply for Medicaid - Health Insurance Coverage
quests.notes: CRITICAL: Apply for Medicaid now (no job). 2 phases: Start application, then submit tax returns when ready

subtasks.title: Research Medicaid eligibility requirements in your state (15 min)
Gather required documents (ID, proof of residency, SSN) (30 min)
Go to Healthcare.gov or state Medicaid website (5 min)
Create account on Medicaid application portal (10 min)
Fill out personal information section (20 min)
Upload initial documents (ID, residency proof) (15 min)
Save confirmation number and application ID (5 min)
‚è∏Ô∏è Wait for 2023 tax return to be filed
‚è∏Ô∏è Wait for 2024 tax return to be filed
Download tax return PDFs from TurboTax (5 min)
Log back into Medicaid application portal (5 min)
Upload 2023 tax return as income verification (10 min)
Upload 2024 tax return as income verification (10 min)
Submit updated application with tax documents (10 min)
